commit.message:
Set statement to true before callback

This way we make sure that when the other thread goes to read
self.monitor.is_changed it is actually set, especially if for some
reason sending the "signal" down the pipe causes the read to wakeup
before the thread finishes processing.

Set statement to true before callback

This way we make sure that when the other thread goes to read
self.monitor.is_changed it is actually set, especially if for some
reason sending the "signal" down the pipe causes the read to wakeup
before the thread finishes processing.

commit.message: bump wait
avoid large reload loops due to many files changing
add changelog for #65
avoid sending a SIGTERM when receiving a SIGINT
do not forward a SIGTERM to the child when receiving a SIGINT
handle SIGINT explicitly and make WorkerResult more readable
bring back PYTHONPATH manipulation
fix to not error when adding signals on windows
fix lint and run isort
ensure watchman subscriptions are unique and emit warnings
fix tests
fix reloader tests
stop overriding the suprocess environ
remove deprecation warnings on imp module
refactor the control loop and handle sigterm
show badges for master
badge harder
